create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_REVENUEBYAPPEALCATEGORYCODEFORCAST ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @GLFISCALYEARID uniqueidentifier, @FORECASTSTRING nvarchar(max) ) as
set nocount on; Declare @ITEMLISTXML xml select @ITEMLISTXML = cast(@FORECASTSTRING as xml) if @ID is null set @ID = newid() insert into dbo.debug(MESSAGE) values (@FORECASTSTRING) if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate() DECLARE @ErrMsg VARCHAR(127) = 'Error saving forecast input' begin try IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#FORECASTRESULTS') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FORECASTRESULTS;
SELECT * INTO #FORECASTRESULTS FROM (
select T.c.value('(ID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'ID', T.c.value('(JAN)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJAN', T.c.value('(FEB)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHFEB', T.c.value('(MAR)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHMAR', T.c.value('(APR)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHAPR', T.c.value('(MAY)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHMAY', T.c.value('(JUN)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJUN', T.c.value('(JUL)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJUL', T.c.value('(AUG)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHAUG', T.c.value('(SEP)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHSEP', T.c.value('(OCT)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHOCT', T.c.value('(NOV)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHNOV', T.c.value('(DEC)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHDEC' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/FORECASTDETAIL/ITEM') T(c) ) ALLMONTHFORECAST
--SELECT * FROM #FORECASTRESULTS
Declare @FORCASTBYMONTH table (ID uniqueidentifier , MONTHID int, FORECASTAMOUNT money) -- Transform column to rows
insert into @FORCASTBYMONTH (ID, MONTHID, FORECASTAMOUNT) select ID,1, ISNULL(MONTHJAN,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,2, ISNULL(MONTHFEB,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,3, ISNULL(MONTHMAR,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,4, ISNULL(MONTHAPR,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,5, ISNULL(MONTHMAY,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,6, ISNULL(MONTHJUN,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,7, ISNULL(MONTHJUL,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,8, ISNULL(MONTHAUG,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,9, ISNULL(MONTHSEP,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,10,ISNULL(MONTHOCT,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,11,ISNULL(MONTHNOV,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,12,ISNULL(MONTHDEC,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS
insert into dbo.USR_REVENUECATEGORYBYAPPEALCODEFORECAST (GLFISCALYEARID,APPEALCATEGORYCODEID, MONTHID, EXPECTEDTOTALGIFTAMOUNT, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) select @GLFISCALYEARID as FISCALYEAR , ID as APPEALCATEGORYCODEID , MONTHID as MONTHID , FORECASTAMOUNT as FORECASTAMOUNT , @CHANGEAGENTID as ADDEDBYID , @CHANGEAGENTID as CHANGEDBYID , @CURRENTDATE as DATEADDED , @CURRENTDATE as DATECHANGED FROM @FORCASTBYMONTH end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
